The maker of this movie never claimed it was based on a true story, notice how it doesn't, at all, ever, say, "based on a true story" or any thing like that. It thanks some police station for images but it does NOT say it was based on a true story. The director also says it wasn't. This movie was filmed in a week and edited in another week and published in an indie movie fest in 2007 where it started gaining publicity. 2 years later it was released in some movie theaters across the US and a couple weeks later released all across the US. 

I personally think this is a really good movie, first half is sort of boring but the second half is amaaazing.

People still download this..? Kidding right? The movie isn't scary, but I have to admit that they did a DECENT job for the timespan and experience they had. 

But that doesn't make it a good movie! Everyone who I talked with about this movie said that it was 'sooooo scary', and when I said that it didn't scare me at all, they come back at me with 'yeah but they made it in like a few weeks with a low budget'. And then I just laugh at them and change the subject.. How does a low budget and little time make a movie good? God! I can't get it into my head..

Lol people we don't care about your opinions about how u or ur friends think this movie sucks. I mean give a rating but i dont want an essay with it. This movie wasn't actually all that bad. So to any1 who hasnt seen it. Dont read the rest of the comments coz they contain spoilers and watch it. If you are bored easily unless a car blows up every 2 min then dont watch. But if you like story n don't mind a plot watch it. Im not gonna say its hugely scary but it makes u think about walking through ur house in the dark for the next 2 nights or so.
